scripts.dev: concurrently "(npm run develop --prefix backend)" "(npm run dev --prefix frontend)"
scripts.setup_frontend: npm init vite@latest frontend -- --template react; npm pkg set proxy=http://localhost:1337 --prefix frontend; npm i --prefix frontend
scripts.setup_backend: npx create-strapi-app@latest backend --template sneakmax --quickstart --no-run; cd backend && npm run strapi import -- -f ../data.tar.gz --force; rm ../data.tar.gz
